original_title: New school term to begin on Monday
original_body_lines: The first school term for the 2023 academic year will commence on Monday (27 March), the Ministry of Education announced today (23 March).
Accordingly, all government and government-approved private schools will begin their first term for 2023 on Monday.
Meanwhile, the third term for the 2022 academic year is due to end on Friday (24 March), the Ministry added.
